author: Christopher Brito
title: Bodies pile up on streets in Ecuador as coronavirus spreads
description: Some residents have gone as far as pleading with authorities on social media to help pick them up.
content:
Caution: Some readers may find the details and images in this story disturbing.
The novel coronavirus has ravaged the coastal Ecuadorian city of Guayaquil, which has struggled to cope with the number of corpses as hospitals, morgues and funeral parlors have … [+3058 chars]
